definition: to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]

sentences.english: He tries to catch volcanoes when they are their highest levels of activity, but calculating the ups and downs of the eruptions can take days to complete.
sentences.chinese: 但是考虑到火山喷发，跌宕起伏，须耗时数日。

sentences.english: Ups and downs, there are lush snow mountains and spruces .
sentences.chinese: 山峦起伏跌宕，生长着茂密的雪岭云杉，苍苍莽莽。

sentences.english: In his latest movie, the action is fast and furious.
sentences.chinese: 在他的最新电影中，情节起伏跌宕。

sentences.english: My life has always been that roller coaster of ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 我的生活一直像坐过山车似的跌宕起伏。

sentences.english: It was a topsy-turvy season to watch; has it felt the same way from a playing point of view?
sentences.chinese: 这是个跌宕起伏的赛季，当局者和旁观者感觉一样吗？

sentences.english: These narrative reversions reach a surprising effect of ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 这些叙事逆转在叙事上达到了跌宕起伏的惊奇效果。

sentences.english: It tells about the ups and downs of the Berglund family over many years.
sentences.chinese: 它讲述了跌宕起伏的贝里隆德家庭多年。

sentences.english: This is a story about military strategy and tactics, with some counterintuitive twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个关于军队斗智斗勇的故事，包含跌宕与起伏。

sentences.english: Michelia study is a full day of tears, reading makes me feel ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 读书是一段满含笑泪的日子，读书使我心情跌宕起伏。

sentences.english: Despite the many ups and downs we have experienced, our relationship has moved forward.
sentences.chinese: 尽管风风雨雨，跌宕起伏，但是两国关系还是前进的。

sentences.english: The melody of the story won't be so euphonious and undulatory.
sentences.chinese: 故事的旋律不会如此悠扬跌宕。

definition: one climax follows another (of thrilling story)
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
lit. sinking and floating/to bob up and down on water/ebb and flow/fig. rise and fall/ups and downs of fortune/vicissitudes
ups and downs (of life etc)/to drift along/to sink and emerge
soul-stirring (of drama, poem or artwork)/heart-rending/deeply moving
to rage/to dash/to surge/also written 激盪|激荡
to move up and down/to undulate/ups and downs
